short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The first open-source browser extension wallet for NOTE protocol assets on bitcoin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The first open-source browser extension wallet for NOTE protocol assets on bitcoin.

Features
- Store and transfer your N20 assets 
- 100% Open-source (Repository link: https://github.com/notemarketio/notemarket-wallet)
